column4: is there a way to hide .css file from users of webpage. put it in a folder from where only webserver apache can access it. and user cannot access the .css directly . any way?
it is always saved somewhere automatically. That's how the web works.
have you invented a really awesome css-technique or why are you afraid of that?
i sell css. and when i show demos of webs. people copy .css while viewing it
